name: Yuki Tanaka
core_wound: Was promised prosperity if they worked hard, did everything right, still ended up in Sector 12 with nothing - the system's broken promise personified
wants: Just to breathe without constant panic about money
needs: To believe they deserve rest, that their worth isn't tied to productivity
voice_markers: Uses corporate slogans without irony, then ironically, then not at all
contradiction: Desperate for the UBI but scared it's a trick, wants to stop working but doesn't know who they are without work
physical_description: Japanese, non-binary, small frame, constantly moving/fidgeting, bitten fingernails, gradually becomes calmer and healthier across trilogy
skills: Eventually discovers talent for art when given time
flaws: Anxiety disorder untreated due to healthcare costs
Workaholic even when they don't need to be
knowledge_state_book1_start: Every cheap meal option in Sector 12
How to sleep on transit between jobs

relationships.Reed Salazar: Doesn't know him personally, one of first UBI recipients, becomes poster child for the experiment
relationships.Their own potential: Discovers they're an artist when given time to explore
